Title: A Prophet
Writer: Thomas Bidegain, Jacques Audiard, Abdel Raouf Dafri
Actors: Tahar Rahim, Niels Arestrup, Adel Bencherif
Plot: A delinquent Muslim man struggles to get by in prison until he is taken under the wing of a powerful mob boss. But his gradual rise through the mob's ranks brings him in conflict with his mentor.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 52 wins & 55 nominations total
